fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Enoch Powell died in 1998, not 1988 (Bishop joins opposition to ‘honouring racist views of Enoch Powell’ with blue plaque, 9 February, page 11, early editions). • Conservators will carry out work at Hill House in Scotland, not conservationists as we said (£1.5m appeal for box to save Mackintosh house from the Scottish rain, 2 February, page 22). As our style guide points out, a conservator works to repair and preserve cultural objects, while a conservationist works with the natural environment.
